subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
Originally written as {{zh-l|𦅻}}. {{Han compound|糸|爰|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p|t1=silk}}.

|mn-t=huêng2/huang2/mang7
|mn-t_note=huêng2/huang2 - literary (huêng2 - Chaozhou); mang7 - semantic (訓讀) (original character is {{zh-l|*慢}})

|cat=a,v
